text: jinnukaḷuṭeyuṁ manuṣyaruṭeyuṁ samūhamē, enṟe pramāṇaṅṅaḷ vivariccutarikayuṁ ī dinatte nēriṭēṇṭivarumenn munnaṟiyipp nalkukayuṁ ceyyunna, niṅṅaḷil ninnutanneyuḷḷa daivadūtanmār niṅṅaḷuṭe aṭutt vannirunnillē?” avar paṟayuṁ: "ate; ñaṅṅaḷitā ñaṅṅaḷkketire tanne sākṣyaṁ vahikkunnu.” aihikajīvitaṁ avare vañcanayilakappeṭutti. taṅṅaḷ satyaniṣēdhikaḷāyirunnuvenn annēraṁ avar taṅṅaḷkketire tanne sākṣyaṁ vahikkunnu
